instructions: Open the phone dialer . Select the contact you want to video call. Tap the Duo icon underneath the contact's details to initiate a video call. How to use Google Duo in the Galaxy S20 phone dialer Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central The video call will be transferred over to Duo , and you can chat like you would on any Duo call. You can also switch from a regular voice call to a video call. When you're in a call, hit the Video call button to switch to Duo. How to use Google Duo in the Galaxy S20 phone dialer Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central
